titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to encourage Canadian tourism to the United States.
Promoting Tourism to Enhance our Economy Act of 2019
Promoting Tourism to Enhance our Economy Act of 2019
Promoting Tourism to Enhance our Economy Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.
